name: Better Call Saul Season 4
summary: AMC已续订《风骚律师》第四季。
info:
• 中文名: 风骚律师 第四季
  • 主演: Giancarlo Esposito
  • 别名: 绝命律师 第四季
  • 集数: 10
  • 开始: 2018年8月6日
  • 类型: 剧情 / 喜剧 / 犯罪
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视台: AMC
  • 首播国家: 美国

eps.name: Smoke
eps.desc: Jimmy struggles to cope with Chuck's tragic death. Mike ponders his role at Madrigal. Howard makes a startling confession.

eps.name: Breathe
eps.desc: Jimmy seeks new employment. Gus navigates the fallout from Hector's collapse. Kim endeavors to support Jimmy in the wake of Chuck's death.

eps.name: Something Beautiful
eps.desc: Jimmy puts a risky plan into motion; as alliances shift, Nacho finds himself in the crosshairs; Kim contemplates her future.

eps.name: Talk
eps.desc: A restless Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor while Mike burns bridges; Kim pursues her bliss; Nacho tries to survive a turf war.

eps.name: Quite a Ride
eps.desc: Jimmy identifies a new market for his talents; Mike vets a potential partnership; Kim drives a hard bargain.

eps.name: Piñata
eps.desc: While Jimmy daydreams about reconstituting Wexler-McGill, Kim sets out to secure her own future; Mike puts a plan into motion for Gus.

eps.name: Something Stupid
eps.desc: Jimmy runs into a problem as he expands his business that only Kim can solve. Gus gets involved in Hector's medical care. Mike has to deal with a setback.

eps.name: Coushatta
eps.desc: Jimmy goes to great lengths to right a wrong, as Kim pulls out all the stops for a case; Mike lets his team blow off steam; Nacho receives a visitor.

eps.name: Wiedersehen
eps.desc: Jimmy and Kim unburden themselves, risking their relationship in the process; Nacho is forced to make the rounds with Lalo; Mike has cause to worry.

eps.name: Winner
eps.desc: Jimmy turns the page on his reputation; Lalo tracks a loose end in Gus's operation; Mike is forced to make a difficult decision.
